name: tenantRelationships_managedTenants_CreateTenantsDetailedInformation
description: Create new navigation property to tenantsDetailedInformation for tenantRelationships

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**city**: The city where the managed tenant is located. Optional. Read-only.
**countryCode**: The code for the country where the managed tenant is located. Optional. Read-only.
**countryName**: The name for the country where the managed tenant is located. Optional. Read-only.
**defaultDomainName**: The default domain name for the managed tenant. Optional. Read-only.
**displayName**: The display name for the managed tenant.
**industryName**: The business industry associated with the managed tenant. Optional. Read-only.
**region**: The region where the managed tenant is located. Optional. Read-only.
**segmentName**: The business segment associated with the managed tenant. Optional. Read-only.
**tenantId**: The Azure Active Directory tenant identifier for the managed tenant.
**verticalName**: The vertical associated with the managed tenant. Optional. Read-only.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
